entry.title: F0797 App Extension OData Service - Manage Billing Docs.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have successfully created a Fiori Extension Project in BAS for Fiori App F0797: Manage Billing Documents. I added a new custom action/button to the worklistview. The new button will update the billing date for the records selected in the worklist. In my app preview, the button is displayed correctly, and the popup is also working as expected and provided the user with the option to select the new billing date.

How to tie this to the backend SAP system for processing?
The OData project in SEGW is SD_CUSTOMER_INVOICES_MANAGE. My question is, do I need to create a copy of this project and add my custom logic in the DPC_EXT class?  Or, am I able to create a new service entirely and add it to my Extension project in BAS? The new service would only be enabled for my custom action/button. What is the preferred approach when extending Fiori Apps which are UI5 based?

Attached are my worklist custom controller. 

Br,
Jared

entry.title: Developing cloud-ready Adobe Forms on-premise
entry.content:
Hi all,

we're running S/4 HANA 2023 FP1 on-premise and as part of our clean core strategy, we need to deal with forms as well. As today, we use all available technologies like SAPScript, SmartForms as well as Adobe Forms. For sure, we only stick to Adobe Forms for new forms since several years.

To my understanding, we can use SAP Forms in BTP also on-premise. It will only be a replacement for our on-prem ADS, but there is no need to change any print report or form. So we can still use all the NAST and other stuff available since decades. This only covers infrastructure in my opinion. But what is the difference from a developers perspective?

As we all know, reports are not clean core compliant. This must also be true to print reports you define in customizing. So there will be no print report in future anymore. We actually have no plans to move to cloud but at least I want to be prepared for this. This brings me to my final question

What do we need to consider when it comes to developing SAP Forms in a cloud-ready manner? Where and how should we place our custom logic for custom forms as well as for SAP standard forms (i.e. handling templates for invoices, purchase orders etc.)? How to do this to be able to use the form in both, on-premise as well as cloud?

- do we need to replace the logic from Z-print reports to Z-classes? (we typically do this these days)
- do we need to place custom logic into interface of a form (we do this for standard forms [invoices] to be able to stick to standard print reports)
- anything else we should consider on-premise?

As said, actually there are no plans to move but at least we should be prepared for this. At least we need to refine our development guidelines to reflect any new concept.

Our current approach looks like this:
- in case of totally custom form, any code is handled by dedicated print classes. The classes implement the business logic as well as calling the form FMs
- in case of adopting standard forms, we copy standard form interfaces and add any additional custom code inside this. Same is true for form itself for sure. By this, we can still use standard print reports 
- in any case, we try to avoid mixing both concepts. Code should be either in dedicated print class or in interface but not in both.

I hope someone can give me some hints

Patrick

entry.title: Missing reference documents for the HU In transaction /SCWM/GRPE
entry.content:
Hi,

In transaction /SCWM/GRPE, I observed that when a Handling Unit (HU) is registered for an inbound delivery and subsequent inbound deliveries are attempted to be assigned to the same HU, the newly added deliveries do not persist as reference documents for the HU after saving. Upon debugging, I noted that SAP executes a memory clear function within the FORM HU_DELETE_FROM_MEMORY of program /SCWM/LHUMAINF08 To delete the new references (new deliveries). It is a potential SAP bug or expected system behavior ?

Thank you.

entry.title: SAPF110V and SAPMF05A Program last changed user is DDIC
entry.content: Auditors are asking what changes were done by DDIC user for the programs SAPF110V (F110) and SAPMF05A (FB08)? When we look at the versions in development system, we do not see any versions. How do we prove to the Auditors that no changes were done to these programs? Appreciate your inputs.

entry.title: Any API or EML for posting with clearing for vendor transfer?
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I really hope that your knowledge help me with this problem.

Currently I need to create a program that allows to transfer posting with clearing in Cloud Public. This process was cover in On-Premise system by the FB05 transaction and its respectives BAPIS.

But now I tried to do the process with the API JournalEntryBulkClearingRequest_In (API Reference | Journal Entry - Clearing (Asynchronous) | SAP Business Accelerator Hub) but is not possible because it required to indicate the bill and the payment, in this case I only has the bill.

I tried with EML but the entity I_JOURNALENTRYTP doesn't have the clearing scenario.

entry.title: Unable to Deploy RAP application into Fiori launchpad in SAP public cloud(3SL)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have created a custom RAP application in Eclipse using a development tenant. The application is working fine in the service binding preview and is showing data correctly.

However, I am facing an issue when trying to deploy this RAP application to the Fiori Launchpad. I am unsure about the correct steps to make it available in the launchpad in the SAP Public Cloud (3-System Landscape).

Has anyone faced the same issue and successfully deployed a RAP application to the Fiori Launchpad? Any guidance or step-by-step instructions would be highly appreciated.

Thank you in advance!

Regards,
Sanjay

entry.title: RAP Custom Entity Deep associations
entry.content:
Hi there,

I composed a root custom entity Header which has a composition of 1 _to HeaderStart. Custom entity HeaderStart has a 1..* composition of _toLines. And the lines Custom Entity has a composition of _toDeliveryDetails. Custom Entity DeliveryDetails has a composition of one _toAddress Custom Entity.

Header->_toHeaderStart->_toLines->_toDeliveryDetails->_toAddress

i created a class and implemented the if_rap_query_provider. 

In my service i exposed all the entities. I created an odata v4 service

when i test my service via the gateway client I can only expand one level deep.

but i also want to expand to all other compositions but in one call starting from my root custom entity ZCE.

/ZCE(par1=â€˜1â€™,par2=â€˜2â€™)/Set&?expand=_toHeaderStart,_toLines,_toDeliveryDetails,_toAddress

in the debugger i come only two times in the select. But i want to deep nest further. Is this possible with custom entity?

I designed it like this because i need a nested json.

Any help or tips are appreciated.

Kind regards, 

#RAP#CustomEntity #Composition

#associations

entry.title: Requirement to Disable/Hide â€˜Post Goods Issueâ€™ in ME2ON output screen.
entry.content:
Hi ,

 

We have a requirement to hide/disable/suppress the â€˜Post Goods Issueâ€™ option on the output screen of transaction ME2ON.

The business process requires users to perform goods issue only with reference to outbound delivery, and not directly with reference to the PO. Therefore, PGI should not be available in ME2ON.

Key points:

  • Requirement: Hide/disable/suppress PGI field in ME2ON.

  • User will always issue goods with reference to outbound delivery.

  • Creation of a new Z transaction code is not an acceptable option.

Could you please share your inputs or recommended approach to achieve this requirement?

Thanks & Regards,
Manohar

entry.title: How to add entries to transports to delete objects which were deleted in Dev and not in TADIR?
entry.content:
Hi community,
we have created a solution in abap and all development is done in one development-package in our own namespace. We delivered it by creating a transport-request with all objects of that development-package on it.

Now we have a newer version of the solution. But some development-objects where deleted in the development since the first release. We will deliver the software again as a big transport with all development-objects of our development-package on it. 
We create this transport programmatically by selecting all objects from table TADIR for our development-package. Then we use the function-module "TRINT_OBJECTS_CHECK_AND_INSERT" to put all the selected development objects on the transport. 

But this transport now should not contain only all available development-objects. It shell also contain all development-objects which were deleted since the last transport. So we read table "E071" for the transport of the previous release, check all entries if they still exists in TADIR and for all found no longer existing development objects we want a "delete"-entry in the transport request. 
First try was to use the same function module and setting the value for "objfunc" to "D" for deletion. But the Functionmodule seems to check all added entries for existence against TADIR (throws exception "show_only_tadir_missing").

Principally it should work to add such deletion entries to a transport because i saw it in other software-packages we installed by using transports. The E071 for such transport shows also only a value of "D" for Attribute OBJFUNC.

So my question is how to achive this. is there any special parameter in function-module "TRINT_OBJECTS_CHECK_AND_INSERT" or do i have to use another function-module or abap-class/-method?

Any idea would be hardly welcome.
kind regards
Matthias

entry.title: Performance Issue in 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Recently, we encountered a performance issue when updating the condition price against the material info record using the BAPI - 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'.  

After analysing the info record and BAPI, we found that a particular PIR has a certain number (i.e., 800) of existing condition validity periods due to the customer updating the price on a daily basis as per their business. Inside the BAPI, there is a method 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' and a call function 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' for finding all existing validity periods. This function module has the following subroutine, and it takes time to read that much of validity periods.

PERFORM kon_select IN PROGRAM (maintain_program)
USING t180-aktyp no no.

 It has increased the runtime for updating the price of a single material. Is there any alternate approach to boost the performance of the condition price update.

Many thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: Performance Issue in BAPI 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Recently, we encountered a performance issue when updating the condition price against the material info record using the BAPI 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'.

After analysing the info record details on ME13 and BAPI, the particular PIR has a certain number (i.e., 800) of condition validity periods. Inside BAPI, there are methods 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' and call the function 'COND_MNT_START' to find all existing validity periods.

This function module has the following subroutine, and it takes time to read all existing condition validity periods.

PERFORM kon_select IN PROGRAM (maintain_program)
USING t180-aktyp no no.

It has increased the runtime (30 - 60 secs) to update the condition price for a single material. Is there any alternate approach to boost the performance for price update.

Many thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: DELINS IDoc: How can system accept different time daily schedule line
entry.content:
We receive inbound DELINS IDoc and for one location, it wants to accept time specific daily schedule lines for SDSA.  Currently, the logic in IDOC_INPUT_DELINS overwrites the existing daily schedule line if the incoming IDoc has the same date even if the time and quantity is different.  In manual VA32 transaction, it allows multiple daily schedule line for the same date and different time.  But not for the inbound IDoc. 

For example, if the SDSA has existing daily schedule line 19.09.2025 time 04:00 with quantity 300 ST, and then IDoc segment field E1EDP16-EDATUV 19.09.2025, E1EDP16-EZEIT 16:00 with quantity E1EDP16-WMENG 150 ST.  The SDSA schedule line will be updated to 19.09.2025 16:00 150 ST.  Our expectation is the SDSA should have 2 daily lines for the date 19.09.2025.

I'm not sure if this is a bug but in case, is there a note on this?  Or can this be solved by customizing or a user-exit/enhancement needs to be implemented in function module IDOC_INPUT_DELINS?
